1: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> אַיֶּ֥לֶת <sup>365 </sup> <n>upon Aijeleth</n> הַשַּׁ֗חַר <sup>7837 </sup> <n>Shahar</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> אֵלִ֣י <sup>410 </sup> <n>My God</n> אֵ֭לִי <sup>410 </sup> <n>my God</n> לָמָ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> עֲזַבְתָּ֑נִי <sup>5800 </sup> <n>why hast thou forsaken</n> רָח֥וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>me? [why art thou so] far</n> מִֽ֝ישׁוּעָתִ֗י <sup>3444 </sup> <n>from helping</n> דִּבְרֵ֥י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>me [and from] the words</n> שַׁאֲגָתִֽי׃ <sup>7581 </sup> <n>of my groaning</n>
2: אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <sup>430 </sup> <n>O my God</n> אֶקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>I cry</n> י֭וֹמָם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>in the daytime</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have no</n> תַעֲנֶ֑ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>but thou hearest</n> וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>not and in the night season</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have no</n> דֽוּמִיָּ֥ה <sup>1747 </sup> <n>and am not silent</n> לִֽי׃
3: וְאַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> קָד֑וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>But thou [art] holy</n> י֝וֹשֵׁ֗ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[O thou] that inhabitest</n> תְּהִלּ֥וֹת <sup>8416 </sup> <n>the praises</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
4: בְּ֭ךָ בָּטְח֣וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>trusted</n> אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>Our fathers</n> בָּ֝טְח֗וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>in thee they trusted</n> וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵֽמוֹ׃ <sup>6403 </sup> <n>and thou didst deliver</n>
5: אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> זָעֲק֣וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>They cried</n> וְנִמְלָ֑טוּ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>unto thee and were delivered</n> בְּךָ֖ בָטְח֣וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>they trusted</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and were not</n> בֽוֹשׁוּ׃ <sup>954 </sup> <n>in thee and were not confounded</n>
6: וְאָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> תוֹלַ֣עַת <sup>8438 </sup> <n>But I [am] a worm</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and no man</n> חֶרְפַּ֥ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>a reproach</n> אָ֝דָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> וּבְז֥וּי <sup>959 </sup> <n>and despised</n> עָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n>
7: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> רֹ֭אַי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>All they that see</n> יַלְעִ֣גוּ <sup>3932 </sup> <n>me laugh me to scorn</n> לִ֑י יַפְטִ֥ירוּ <sup>6362 </sup> <n>separate</n> בְ֝שָׂפָ֗ה <sup>8193 </sup> <n>the lip</n> יָנִ֥יעוּ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>they shake</n> רֹֽאשׁ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the head</n>
8: גֹּ֣ל <sup>1556 </sup> <n>He trusted</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>on the LORD</n> יְפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <sup>6403 </sup> <n>[that] he would deliver</n> יַ֝צִּילֵ֗הוּ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>him let him deliver</n> כִּ֘י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> חָ֥פֵֽץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>him seeing he delighted</n> בּֽוֹ׃
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Yet</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> גֹחִ֣י <sup>1518 </sup> <n>But thou [art] he that took</n> מִבָּ֑טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>me out of the womb</n> מַ֝בְטִיחִ֗י <sup>982 </sup> <n>thou didst make me hope</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שְׁדֵ֥י <sup>7699 </sup> <n>breasts</n> אִמִּֽי׃ <sup>517 </sup> <n>[when I was] upon my mother's</n>
10: עָ֭לֶיךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הָשְׁלַ֣כְתִּי <sup>7993 </sup> <n>I was cast</n> מֵרָ֑חֶם <sup>7358 </sup> <n>upon thee from the womb</n> מִבֶּ֥טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>belly</n> אִ֝מִּ֗י <sup>517 </sup> <n>from my mother's</n> אֵ֣לִי <sup>410 </sup> <n>thou [art] my God</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
11: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>be not</n> תִּרְחַ֣ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>Be not far</n> מִ֭מֶּנִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> צָרָ֣ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>from me for trouble</n> קְרוֹבָ֑ה <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] near</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> עוֹזֵֽר׃ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>for [there is] none to help</n>
12: סְ֭בָבוּנִי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>have compassed</n> פָּרִ֣ים <sup>6499 </sup> <n>bulls</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Many</n> אַבִּירֵ֖י <sup>47 </sup> <n>me strong</n> בָשָׁ֣ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>[bulls] of Bashan</n> כִּתְּרֽוּנִי׃ <sup>3803 </sup> <n>have beset me round</n>
13: פָּצ֣וּ <sup>6475 </sup> <n>They gaped</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פִּיהֶ֑ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>upon me [with] their mouths</n> אַ֝רְיֵ֗ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>lion</n> טֹרֵ֥ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>[as] a ravening</n> וְשֹׁאֵֽג׃ <sup>7580 </sup> <n>and a roaring</n>
14: כַּמַּ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>like water</n> נִשְׁפַּכְתִּי֮ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>I am poured out</n> וְהִתְפָּֽרְד֗וּ <sup>6504 </sup> <n>are out of joint</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַצְמ֫וֹתָ֥י <sup>6106 </sup> <n>and all my bones</n> הָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לִ֭בִּי <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> כַּדּוֹנָ֑ג <sup>1749 </sup> <n>is like wax</n> נָ֝מֵ֗ס <sup>4549 </sup> <n>it is melted</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> מֵעָֽי׃ <sup>4578 </sup> <n>of my bowels</n>
15: יָ֘בֵ֤שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>is dried up</n> כַּחֶ֨רֶשׂ ׀ <sup>2789 </sup> <n>like a potsherd</n> כֹּחִ֗י <sup>3581 </sup> <n>My strength</n> וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and my tongue</n> מֻדְבָּ֣ק <sup>1692 </sup> <n>cleaveth</n> מַלְקוֹחָ֑י <sup>4455 </sup> <n>to my jaws</n> וְֽלַעֲפַר־ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>me into the dust</n> מָ֥וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n> תִּשְׁפְּתֵֽנִי׃ <sup>8239 </sup> <n>and thou hast brought</n>
16: כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> סְבָב֗וּנִי <sup>5437 </sup> <n>have compassed</n> כְּלָ֫בִ֥ים <sup>3611 </sup> <n>For dogs</n> עֲדַ֣ת <sup>5712 </sup> <n>me the assembly</n> מְ֭רֵעִים <sup>7489 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> הִקִּיפ֑וּנִי <sup>5362 </sup> <n>have inclosed</n> כָּ֝אֲרִ֗י <sup>3738 </sup> <n>dig</n> יָדַ֥י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hands</n> וְרַגְלָֽי׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>and my feet</n>
17: אֲסַפֵּ֥ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>I may tell</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַצְמוֹתָ֑י <sup>6106 </sup> <n>all my bones</n> הֵ֥מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> יַ֝בִּ֗יטוּ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>they look</n> יִרְאוּ־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[and] stare</n> בִֽי׃
18: יְחַלְּק֣וּ <sup>2505 </sup> <n>They part</n> בְגָדַ֣י <sup>899 </sup> <n>my garments</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and for</n> לְ֝בוּשִׁ֗י <sup>3830 </sup> <n>upon my vesture</n> יַפִּ֥ילוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>among them and cast</n> גוֹרָֽל׃ <sup>1486 </sup> <n>lots</n>
19: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from me O LORD</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>be not</n> תִּרְחָ֑ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>But be not thou far</n> אֱ֝יָלוּתִ֗י <sup>360 </sup> <n>O my strength</n> לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <sup>5833 </sup> <n>thee to help</n> חֽוּשָׁה׃ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>haste</n>
20: הַצִּ֣ילָה <sup>5337 </sup> <n>Deliver</n> מֵחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>from the sword</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> מִיַּד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>from the power</n> כֶּ֝֗לֶב <sup>3611 </sup> <n>of the dog</n> יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <sup>3173 </sup> <n>my darling</n>
21: ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵנִי <sup>3467 </sup> <n>Save</n> מִפִּ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>mouth</n> אַרְיֵ֑ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>me from the lion's</n> וּמִקַּרְנֵ֖י <sup>7161 </sup> <n>me from the horns</n> רֵמִ֣ים <sup>7214 </sup> <n>of the unicorns</n> עֲנִיתָֽנִי׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>for thou hast heard</n>
22: אֲסַפְּרָ֣ה <sup>5608 </sup> <n>I will declare</n> שִׁמְךָ֣ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>thy name</n> לְאֶחָ֑י <sup>251 </sup> <n>unto my brethren</n> בְּת֖וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> קָהָ֣ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>of the congregation</n> אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>will I praise</n>
23: יִרְאֵ֤י <sup>3373 </sup> <n>Ye that fear</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הַֽלְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> זֶ֣רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>him all ye the seed</n> יַעֲקֹ֣ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> כַּבְּד֑וּהוּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>glorify</n> וְג֥וּרוּ <sup>1481 </sup> <n>him and fear</n> מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>of Him</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֶ֥רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>him all ye the seed</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
24: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> בָזָ֨ה <sup>959 </sup> <n>For he hath not despised</n> וְלֹ֪א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> שִׁקַּ֡ץ <sup>8262 </sup> <n>nor abhorred</n> עֱנ֬וּת <sup>6039 </sup> <n>the affliction</n> עָנִ֗י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>of the afflicted</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הִסְתִּ֣יר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>neither hath he hid</n> פָּנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וּֽבְשַׁוְּע֖וֹ <sup>7768 </sup> <n>from him but when he cried</n> אֵלָ֣יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שָׁמֵֽעַ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto him he heard</n>
25: מֵ֥אִתְּךָ֗ <sup>853 </sup> תְֽהִלָּ֫תִ֥י <sup>8416 </sup> <n>My praise</n> בְּקָהָ֥ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>congregation</n> רָ֑ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[shall be] of thee in the great</n> נְדָרַ֥י <sup>5088 </sup> <n>my vows</n> אֲ֝שַׁלֵּ֗ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>I will pay</n> נֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>before them that fear</n>
26: יֹאכְל֬וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> עֲנָוִ֨ים ׀ <sup>6035 </sup> <n>The meek</n> וְיִשְׂבָּ֗עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and be satisfied</n> יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>they shall praise</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> דֹּ֣רְשָׁ֑יו <sup>1875 </sup> <n>that seek</n> יְחִ֖י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall live</n> לְבַבְכֶ֣ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>him your heart</n> לָעַֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
27: יִזְכְּר֤וּ ׀ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>shall remember</n> וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turn</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> אַפְסֵי־ <sup>657 </sup> <n>All the ends</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the world</n> וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>shall worship</n> לְ֝פָנֶ֗יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>and all the kindreds</n> גּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the nations</n>
28: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לַ֭יהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[is] the LORD'S</n> הַמְּלוּכָ֑ה <sup>4410 </sup> <n>For the kingdom</n> וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>and he [is] the governor</n> בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n>
29: אָכְל֬וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֨וּ ׀ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worship</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> דִּשְׁנֵי־ <sup>1879 </sup> <n>All [they that be] fat</n> אֶ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon earth</n> לְפָנָ֣יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יִ֭כְרְעוּ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>shall bow</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יוֹרְדֵ֣י <sup>3381 </sup> <n>all they that go down</n> עָפָ֑ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>to the dust</n> וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his own soul</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> חִיָּֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>him and none can keep alive</n>
30: זֶ֥רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>A seed</n> יַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>shall serve</n> יְסֻפַּ֖ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>him it shall be accounted</n> לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>to the Lord</n> לַדּֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>for a generation</n>
31: יָ֭בֹאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>They shall come</n> וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and shall declare</n> צִדְקָת֑וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n> לְעַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto a people</n> נ֝וֹלָ֗ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that shall be born</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָשָֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath done</n>
